column5: I saw some black smoke in the distance. &That could be the other 7's.
column6: J'ai vu de la fum<e noire au loin.&Cela pourrait $tre les autres de la 7s.

column5: But black smoke would mean...&They could be engaging the enemy.

column5: Right. There could be enemies near us, too.&Let's get back to the others ASAP.

column5: We're back, everybody!&Sorry to worry you.

column5: Welks!&Oh, good... Are you hurt at all?
No, we're fine.&What's your status here?
